justification: “All typically developing children included in the dataset scored below the cut-off for autism (<15) on the Social Communication Questionnaire (SCQ 40) completed by parents.”
“The autistic children also completed module 3 or 4 of the ADOS-2.”

measured_by: Test of Word Reading Efficiency – 2nd Edition (TOWRE-2)
justification: “We measured reading ability with the Test of Word Reading Efficiency ‑2nd Edition (TOWRE-2 43)….”

measured_by: Wechsler Individual Achievement Test (WIAT-III) Spelling subtest
justification: “…and measured spelling ability using the Wechsler Individual Achievement Test (WIAT-III 44) in all participants.”

measured_by: Wechsler Abbreviated Scale of Intelligence, 2nd edition (WASI-II)
justification: “All children included in the dataset had … verbal IQ > 70 and performance IQ > 70 on the Wechsler Abbreviated Scales of Intelligence, 2 nd edition (WASI-II 39).”
“…we also collected parent-report ratings on 9 items assessing children's inattention… from the DSM-IV criteria for ADHD as used in the Swanson, Nolan and Pelham-IV Questionnaire (SNAP-IV 47).”
“…and 9 items assessing hyperactivity/impulsivity, from the DSM-IV criteria for ADHD as used in the Swanson, Nolan and Pelham-IV Questionnaire (SNAP-IV 47).”
“Participants initially completed a Snellen acuity test to confirm normal or corrected-to-normal vision.”
